searchResults.description: This assessment task will be completed in three parts.The first two parts involve reading, drawing visual images, and literature discussion. In part three, students will be asked to write an informative/explanatory text.

resource.title: Over 96% of Earth's water is _______ meaning salt water.
Although there are many rivers and lakes which have freshwater, most of Earth is covered by salt water in the oceans which are much bigger in size.

searchResults.description: Students will learn about the many sources of water of Earth. Students will understand that most of the water found on Earth exists in the oceans as salt water. Only a small portion of Earth's water is fresh water, which is mostly frozen as ice in glaciers or icecaps.
searchResults.goals: Students will learn about the many sources of water of Earth. Students will understand that most of the water found on Earth exists in the oceans as salt water. Only a small portion of Earth's water is fresh water, which is mostly frozen as ice in glaciers or icecaps.
